body.p:
341
Nov. 25nd 3
Mrs Hannah Gill
Louisville -- Ky
Madam,
Your favor of the 20th referred by his Excellency -- the Governor to this Department with instructions.

It is an invariable rule to have the recomendation of a Colonel -- before commissions issue to fill vacancies in his Regiment -- filed in this office. You can doubtfull procure such for your son -- whom, we doubt not, is worthy of promotion. Did we vary from this inflexible custom -- it would be in his case.

If you make application to some colonel -- you wil doubtless receive a letter recommending your son to some position in his regiment -- which you can forward to this office, and he shall be commissioned at once

Respectfully
Your obt Serv't
John Boyle
Adjt. Gen of Ky.
